title: Common Questions from Weight Loss Beginners
itunes:title: Common Questions from Weight Loss Beginners
description:
Get the Free Course here:
https://phit.click/freecourse

 

Today's podcast hits a wide variety of topics that are important to girls who are just starting their weight loss journey. These are some real questions we got during our last 7-day free challenge! I addressed them all on here and have decided to share them here with you.

The topics include menopause, sugar intake, peanut butter, exercise, calorie counting, and getting yourself out of bed in the morning. I'd love your feedback and follow up questions!
